ai-patthana11.11:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana11.11:0.3_0: for the result, constituent group, and result.
ai-patthana11.11:1.1_0: Neutral feeling doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling, nor is a condition for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana11.11:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana11.11:2.1_0: (Also) twenty-four grounds for understanding themetics of wisdom in the past, the future and present these eight classes of rebirth ...
